name: The Contractor demo
description:
The world is in danger !

So pick a class and join the fight as to find out what's causing all of this chaos.

Male/Female class options with multiple classes to pick from ! Finish the demo and try again with a different class till you find one that suits you !

Game demo will feat. Custom keyboard configuration.

Before voting actually try it out for yourself then judge it :) (for steam)

Instructions : Up, down, left and right for movement, enter to accept things/choices and esc key to go back/exit menus and acess menus.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...

Easiest way to get the game is by going through steam :)

Want to support the dev, don't expect anything but adding anyway: https://www.patreon.com/dragon1up
